name: Run Dino!
description:
Run Dino! Is an endless runner game where you play as an dinosaur which you controll by swiping up to jump and down to duck, to avoid dangerous obstacles. Avoid burning asteroids falling from the sky by holding the side of the screen that you want to run towards.

Very easy to play the game, difficult to master!

-- FEATURES--
- Satisfying controls. 
- Amazing graphics.
- Avoid asteroids and other obstacles!
- Increasing difficulty while you play!
- Unlock different Dinos as you play.
- Compete with people all over the world in the leaderboards.
- Great Music and sound effects!
